snippet.title: Friday Night Funkin' VS Mario's Madness V2 FULL WEEK + Cutscenes (FNF Mod) (Mario 85'/MX/Mario.EXE)
snippet.description:
Friday Night Funkin' VS Mario's Madness V2 (FULL WEEK) for the PC in 2160p Ultra HD. This is a mod Directed by Marco Antonio: https://twitter.com/MarcoJurez19
https://gamejolt.com/@Marco_Antonio

This mod is packed with exciting gameplay, fantastic artwork, and an amazing soundtrack! If you love Mario-themed adventures, this mod has everything you could hope for—including a fun Mario Kart song.

In this mod, Boyfriend and Girlfriend take on various unique versions of Mario characters from across the Super Mario Bros fan universe! You'll face off against characters such as:
⭐ Beta Luigi / Luigi from the first Luigi’s Mansion trailer
⭐ IHY Luigi
⭐ The legendary Wario Apparition
⭐ Classic Mario Land characters
⭐ MX from Mario '85 PC Port, and so many more!

 Story Summary:
Boyfriend and Girlfriend discover a mysterious copy of Super Mario Bros., and suddenly, MX pulls them into the game! Now, they must navigate this wild, music-filled adventure and face off against some of the most legendary Mario characters ever!

🔗 Download VS Mario's Madness V2 Here:
Get it on GameBanana! https://gamebanana.com/mods/359554
Play it on GameJolt! https://gamejolt.com/games/mariosmadness/693301
